name: CrazyFastCar
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move!

Drive fast to improve your score!

If you slow down, you health will improve, but your score will decline!

Don't let your health, or score, drop below 0!

There is no reverse in this car, it's only brakes, or forward!

The world is procedurally generated, so if you run into a wall, turn around.

Ignore some of the unfinished assets, I wasn't able to find some online in time.

Was only tested with a 1920x1080 screen, if you use a 4K screen, it may not render properly.

Developed on Linux

Team:

Zion - Programmer
